error.message: Call to deprecated method getBaseThemes() of class Drupal\Core\Theme\ActiveTheme. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Theme\ActiveTheme::getBaseThemeExtensions() instead.

Call to deprecated method getBaseThemes() of class Drupal\Core\Theme\ActiveTheme. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Theme\ActiveTheme::getBaseThemeExtensions() instead.

Call to deprecated method getBaseThemes() of class Drupal\Core\Theme\ActiveTheme. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Theme\ActiveTheme::getBaseThemeExtensions() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to languages_dropdown.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
